original_text: David went out to meet them. He said to them, ‘I hope that you have come here as my friends. If you have come to help me, I will make an agreement with you. But I hope that you have not come here to help my enemies and to tell them where I am hiding. I have not done anything wrong. So I pray that the God of our ancestors will see what you do. He will punish you as you deserve!’
korean_text: 다윗이 나가서 맞아 그들에게 말하여 이르되 만일 너희가 평화로이 내게 와서 나를 돕고자 하면 내 마음이 너희 마음과 하나가 되려니와 만일 너희가 나를 속여 내 대적에게 넘기고자 하면 내 손에 불의함이 없으니 우리 조상들의 하나님이 감찰하시고 책망하시기를 원하노라 하매

sentences.original_text: David went out to meet them.
I hope that you have come here as my friends.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 내 친구로서 여기에 왔기를 바란다.

sentences.original_text: If you have come to help me,
I will make an agreement with you.
But I hope that you have not come here
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 나는 너희가 여기에 온 것이 아님을 바란다.

sentences.original_text: and to tell them where I am hiding.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게 내가 숨어있는 곳을 말해주기 위해.

sentences.original_text: I have not done anything wrong.
So I pray that the God of our ancestors
He will punish you as you deserve!
sentences.korean_translation: 그분이 너희가 마땅히 받아야 할 벌을 내리실 것이다!
